channel.title: CVE Feed for Apollo13Themes -- Apollo13 Framework Extensions
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apollo13Themes -- Apollo13 Framework Extensions

item.title: CVE-2024-37480|2024-07-21T21:21:01.890Z -- apollo13themes -- apollo13%20framework%20extensions
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Apollo13Themes Apollo13 Framework Extensions apollo13-framework-extensions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Apollo13 Framework Extensions: from n/a through 1.9.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-24880|2024-06-04T17:42:59.179Z -- apollo13themes -- apollo13%20framework%20extensions
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Apollo13Themes Apollo13 Framework Extensions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Apollo13 Framework Extensions: from n/a through 1.9.2.
